read_sentiment_dataset[source]

read_sentiment_dataset(path)

Reads the sentiment140 dataset csv file. The dataset can be downloaded from Kaggle

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

subsample_dataset[source]

subsample_dataset(df, no_lines=5000)

Subsamples the dataset for faster processing

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

preprocess_text[source]

preprocess_text(text)

Preprocess tweets to remove https links and mentions Remove punctioation Stemmize the words

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

parallelize(data, func, num_of_processes=8)

Parallelize the dataframe processing

preprocess_df_text(df)

Preprocesses the text field of dataframe

calculate_word_attributes[source]

calculate_word_attributes(df)

Calculates the word attributes in a dataframe such as total words, unique words and word frequency dictionary
